meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she threw the ball to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He threw the paper airplane across the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat threw the toy mouse off the table.
meanings.sent4: The storm threw branches all over the yard.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully threw the pizza dough in the air.

meanings.definition: To propel something with force through the air.
meanings.sent1: The pitcher threw the baseball with great speed.
meanings.sent2: She threw the frisbee to her dog at the park.
meanings.sent3: The strong wind threw the leaves around in circles.
meanings.sent4: The volcano threw ash high into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The child excitedly threw the kite into the air.

meanings.sent1: He angrily threw his phone on the bed.
meanings.sent2: She threw the broken toy in the trash.
meanings.sent3: The magician theatrically threw the cape off his shoulders.
meanings.sent4: The wrestler threw his opponent out of the ring.
meanings.sent5: The teacher threw the old textbooks into the recycling bin.
